mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cool_company ( cool_company_id , cool_company_name , cool_company_email , cool_company_address , cool_company_tel ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{address}, #{tel} )
mapper.select: SELECT cool_company_id as id, cool_company_name as name, cool_company_email as email, cool_company_address as address, cool_company_tel as tel FROM cool_company WHERE cool_company_name=#{name}

SELECT cool_company_id as id, cool_company_name as name, cool_company_email as email, cool_company_address as address, cool_company_tel as tel FROM cool_company WHERE cool_company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%' )
SELECT cool_company_id as id, cool_company_name as name, cool_company_email as email, cool_company_address as address, cool_company_tel as tel FROM cool_company WHERE cool_company_id=#{id}
